Rubber hand can be used as a tool for gardening: It can be used to plants by providing additional support to the stem.
Rubber hand can be used as a tool for painting: It can be used to paint in hard-to- areas or to paint with a specific shape or pattern.
Rubber hand can be used as a tool for cleaning: It can be used dust and dirt from hard-to- areas, such as under furniture or in corners.
Rubber hand can be used as a tool for DIY projects: It can be used toay shapes or patterns in materials such as wood or plastic.
Rubber hand can be used as a tool for physical therapy: It can be used to joints and muscles by providing additional support and resistance.
